oai_dc:dc.dc:title: America depends on the farmer!
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This World War II era poster, created by the Agricultural Extension Service at the University of Tennessee, delivers a message that in order for America to succeed in the war, the farmer must do his part. The poster features an image of a farmer and his family carrying a bushel of produce and ""A Farmer's Wartime Creed."" The creed includes statements reflective of the war-time attitude toward rationing, efficiency, and support of community.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Agricultural Extension Service, University of Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: World War I and World War II Poster Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; Posters
